Source.Name: muparser
Source.Summary: Many applications require the parsing of mathematical expressions. The main objective of this library is to provide a fast and easy way of doing this. muParser is an extensible high performance math expression parser library written in C++. It works by transforming a mathematical expression into bytecode and precalculating constant parts of the expression.
Source.Description: muParser is an extensible high performance math expression parser library written in C++.
